import logo from './logo.svg'; import {useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {BrowserRouter as Router,Routes, Route, NavLink} from 'react-router-dom'; import './App.css'; import Login from './components/Login' import Homepage from './components/Homepage' import Profile from './components/Profile' import Cart from './components/Cart' import Orders from './components/Orders' import Checkout from './components/Checkout' function App() { let [isLogin,setLogin] = useState(false); cosnt [user,setUser] = useState(); console.log("login ",isLogin) useEffect(() => { setLogin(!isLogin) },[user]) const handleLogin = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let {uid,pass} = document.forms[0] Login({uid: uid.value, pass: pass.value}) setUser(sessionStorage.getItem("user")) if(user!=null){ console.log("yes") } } const handleLogout = (event) => { event.preventDefault() sessionStorage.removeItem("user") setUser(null) } return (
{isLogin ? <> Logout Profile Home Cart Orders } /> } /> } /> } /> }/> : <>
